DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy Abdomen Plus Docetaxel Treating Patients With Recurrent Persistent Advanced Ovarian , Peritoneal , Fallopian Tube Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine maximum tolerate dose docetaxel combination low-dose abdominal radiotherapy patient recurrent persistent advanced ovarian , peritoneal , fallopian tube cancer . II . Determine safety toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter , dose-escalation study docetaxel . Patients receive docetaxel IV 30 minute daily day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 , 35 . Within 3 hour begin docetaxel , patient also receive low-dose abdominal radiotherapy twice daily ( least 4 hour apart ) day 1 , 2 , 8 , 9 , 15 , 16 , 22 , 24 , 29 , 30 , 35 , 36 . Treatment continue absence unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos docetaxel maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 2 6 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter .
